title: Menu Square
body:
Menu square content types are used to navigate to important sections of the mobile applications which you may prefer and they will appear in squares.

How to create Menu square content types ?

  • Create a menu square content type page and provide its name in the “Title” field.
  • Save the node and go to its view mode by clicking the “View” tab.
  • Navigate to the bottom of the page to find the “Add Child Page” button and click it.
  • Now add your desired page which will appear in squares.
  • The desired page is where the user will be taken to when a square is clicked.
  • The desired page can be a “Content page”, “Menu list” page or “Content - Menu List” page.
  • You can add images for icons in the “Icons” field provided, which will appear in the square. Once completed, hit the “Save” button to save the changes in the node.
